definition: Seoul, capital of South Korea (Chinese name adopted in 2005 to replace 漢城|汉城[Han4 cheng2])
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
variant of 爾|尔[er3]
thus/so/like that/you/thou
Seoul National University SNU
pinyin: Guo2 li4 Shou3 er3 Da4 xue2

definition: Seoul National University (SNU or Seoul National), Korea
pinyin: Shou3 er3 Guo2 li4 Da4 xue2

definition: Seoul Special Metropolitan City, official name of the capital of South Korea

sentences.english: Top 8 of the preliminary will fight for the bonus on Apr.14 and 15 in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 初赛八强将于4月14日和15日在首尔进行决赛。

sentences.english: The BBC's correspondent in Seoul is John Sudworth.
sentences.chinese: BBC驻首尔记者约翰萨德沃思发来的报道。

sentences.english: So, now, I was about to try a trip into Seoul on my own.
sentences.chinese: 所以，现在，我准备一个人开始一次到首尔的旅行。

sentences.english: Their hope, they said, is that the islands will become Seoul's new cultural hubs.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，希望这些浮岛会成为首尔新的文化中枢。

sentences.english: The policy document does stress the importance of dialogue between Seoul and Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 这份政策文件也强调了首尔与平壤对话的重要性。

sentences.english: In Seoul, Ngoc's murder has spurred a flurry of reform.
sentences.chinese: Ngoc的被杀促使首尔迅速启动了改革。

sentences.english: Seoul reminds me of oue love .
Large parts of the Han river that bisects the capital are frozen over.
sentences.chinese: 将首尔从中隔断的汉江出现大面积结冰。

sentences.english: Can I check my baggage through to Seoul?
sentences.chinese: 我可以查下我的去往首尔包裹吗？

sentences.english: Hong Hyun-ik is a North Korea researcher at the Sejong Institute in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 韩信一是首尔世宗研究所的北韩问题研究员。

sentences.english: Park Ryu Sook Gallery was founded by Ryu-Sook Park in 1983 in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 1983年朴丽淑在韩国首尔创立朴丽淑画廊。

sentences.english: Head Er check just expresses, will up one class court mentions counterappeal.
sentences.chinese: 首尔检方表示，将向上一级法院提起抗诉。

sentences.english: Will Obama get his way in Seoul?
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马会在首尔取得成功吗？

sentences.english: When debuting, John-Hoon was the student of the Seoul University odontology department who was the elite in Korea.
sentences.chinese: 出道时，桢勋还是韩国首尔大学齿科专业的优秀学生。

sentences.english: Head, Clinical Trial Center, Seoul National University; Bun-dang Hospital, Seongnam, Korea.
sentences.chinese: 首尔国立大学盆塘医院，临床试验中心主任。

sentences.english: South Korea's Seoul ranked third, followed closely by Tokyo at No. 4.
sentences.chinese: 韩国的首尔名列第三，东京紧跟其后，位居第四。
